title: Login not working
description: Customer unable to log in to the portal. They tried multiple browsers but the issue persists, blocking their access to critical tools.

title: Payment gateway issue
description: Transactions failing during checkout. Customers report that their cards are charged but orders aren’t confirmed, leading to frustration.

title: Slow dashboard loading
description: Dashboard takes too long to load data. It sometimes freezes for more than 30 seconds, making it difficult for users to track progress.

title: Password reset email not received
description: User not getting reset email after request. They’ve checked spam folders but nothing arrives, preventing them from resetting credentials.

title: UI alignment bug
description: Buttons overlap on mobile screen. The issue mostly occurs on iOS devices and breaks the layout, making forms difficult to submit.

title: Invoice not generated
description: Customer unable to download invoices. This has caused delays in financial reporting and some clients are requesting urgent fixes.

title: Notifications delayed
description: System notifications are delayed by hours. This is creating confusion since users don’t get timely alerts about updates or approvals.

title: Profile picture upload failed
description: Users cannot upload their profile pictures. The upload either times out or shows an unsupported file type error for valid images.

title: App crashing on startup
description: Mobile app crashes immediately after launch. Several Android devices have reported this, making the app completely unusable.

title: Search not returning results
description: Search functionality not working properly. Even when users type exact keywords, no results are displayed, causing major confusion.

title: Report export issue
description: Users unable to export reports as PDF. The system hangs indefinitely and forces them to refresh, losing unsaved progress.

title: Broken links on homepage
description: Some navigation links are broken. Clicking them leads to a 404 page, confusing first-time visitors and reducing trust.
